oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rights bill is compromise, but it is reasonable one
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A newspaper article from The Nashville Tennessean dated April 10, 1960, found on page four-B. The article explains the proposed Senate civil rights bill and its provisions which include voting rights and penalties for hate bombings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil rights demonstrations; Civil rights demonstrations - Tennessee - Nashville; African Americans - Civil rights - Tennessee - Nashville; Sit-ins (Civil rights); Civil rights movements;
